text: Belkommunmash is a Belarusian bus brand headquartered in Minsk it currently makes electric and Hybrid buses Trolleybuses and Trams it was first founded in 1973 as a tram and trolleybus repair facility currently its a large brand of electric public transport vehicles in Belarus and its vehicles are operated in 7 cities in Belarus and over 40 cities in Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Mongolia, Moldova, Argentina, Bulgaria, Bosnia and Herzegovina and Serbia. in 2022 it was sanctioned by the EU and Switzerland. == Models == === Electric buses === * Е420 * Е433 * Е321 File:AKSM_E321_(Belkommunmash_electrobus)_2.jpg|E321 in Minsk File:Belkommunmash_E433_electric_bus_(Minsk)_p1.jpg|E433 in Minsk === Trams === File:AKSM-1M_(BKM-1M)_tram_(under_number_028)_in_Minsk.jpg|AKSM - first- generation tram in Minsk File:AKCM-60102_in_Minsk_2.JPG|AKSM-60102 - second- generation tram in Minsk File:Minsk_031_20070803_0170.jpg|AKSM-743 - third- generation tram in Minsk File:157ozero.jpg|AKSM-843 -
